content: (4700) 8 Gbps  MM 62.5 µm  MM 50 µm   21 m (200)  50 m (500)  150 m (2000)  190 m (4700) 4 Gbps  MM 62.5 µm  MM 50 µm   70 m (200)  150 m (500)  380 m (2000)  400 m (4700) Chapter 4. Central processor complex I/O structure 171 zHyperLink Express1.1 (FC 0451) zHyperLink is a new technology that provides up to 5x reduction in I/O latency times for Db2 read requests with the qualities of service IBM Z clients expect from I/O infrastructure for Db2 v11 plus fixes (for read support) and v12 plus fixes (for write support) with z/OS. The following z/OS versions are supported for zHyperLink:  z/OS V2.5  z/OS V2.4 with PTFs  z/OS V2.3 with PTFs  z/OS V2.2 with PTFs The zHyperLink Express1.1 feature (FC 0451) provides a low latency direct connection between IBM z16 and DS8000 storage system. The zHyperLink Express1.1 is the result of new business requirements that demand fast and consistent application response times. It dramatically reduces latency by interconnecting the IBM
